entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending this afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 15 this morning and minus 7 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 13. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 60 percent chance of light snow overnight. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 near midnight. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of light snow. High minus 11. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of light snow in the morning. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light in the afternoon. High minus 11.
